channel.title: 2021 Artist (re)intro
channel.description:
How bad did 2020 suck?! No need to answer. What a garbage year! With 2021 already underway what better time than to reflect on the last year and think about the remainder of this one. As always, there’s some new faces, and old, so take a minute to either introduce yourself for the first time or re-align your chakra and share any info you’re comfortable to. Showcase some work, tell a little about yourself - totally your call.
You can highlight everything from the picture down and hit quote to get the template, or just copy and paste. Whatever floats your boat! Glasses raised to a year better than 2020!
> ![download|259x194](https://global.discourse-cdn.com/standard10/uploads/auxy/original/2X/b/bfad3be4b22558489f7b0935c34a8f7ce4bd6a79.png) > **Name (or producer name):** > **Other / Historical Names:** None. > **Country of residence:** xxxxxxxxx > **Age (optional):** > **Gender (optional):** > **Preferred Genre(s) for creating tracks:** > **Preferred Genre(s) for listening to:** > **My best tracks (3 max):** > **Most commonly used Auxy sounds or sound packs?** > **Did I achieve my musical goals for 2020?** > **Musical goals for 2021:** > **Fav music related websites:** > **One thing you would like to see in a 2021 sound pack?**
> **Online presence:** > > * **Soundcloud:** > * **Instagram:** > * **Twitter:** > * **Discord:** > * **Youtube:** > * **Snapchat:** > * **Spotify:** > * **Website(s):** > * **Facebook:** > * **[Other]:**

item.title: 2021 Artist (re)intro
item.dc:creator: Slash
item.description:
(upload://mEDDdlIbMTXOqCQVwReDPO8SKKB.jpeg)
Name (or producer name): Real name: Benjamin Allen Mayo| Producer Name: STEREOFYLDZ
Other / Historical Names: $L@$H
Country of residence: America
Age (optional): 16
Gender (optional): Male
Preferred Genre(s) for creating tracks: Electro house, big room, complextro, progressive house and dubstep
Preferred Genre(s) for listening to: See above
My best tracks (3 max): Paradise, I’ll Be Okay, and Pursuit In Neon City
Most commonly used Auxy sounds or sound packs? Bee, Barber, Restart, Drill, Weld, Dawn, Battery, Spray, Stress and Mascara
Did I achieve my musical goals for 2020? Yep, had a collab with my sister, Makayla
Musical goals for 2021:
Fav music related websites: Soundcloud, Bandcamp and iHeartRadio
One thing you would like to see in a 2021 sound pack? Some complextro basses and synths, and some Deadmau5/Zedd style plucks (like the ones Deadmau5 uses in in Strobe, Sofi Needs A Ladder and The Veldt, and like the ones Zedd used in Spectrum and Clarity). Some Vocaloid vocal chops (AVANNA or Hatsune Miku ones, preferably) would also be pretty cool, I guess. (Call me a weeb, I really don’t care.)

Online presence:

  • Soundcloud: https://m.soundcloud.com/stereofyldz
  • Instagram: None
  • Twitter: I believe I’ve established my opinion on that political cesspool.
  • Discord: None
  • Youtube: Antonio The Sheep
  • Snapchat: None
  • Spotify: Mainly use it for listening to music, so I see no point in placing a link here
  • Website(s): Taken down
  • Facebook: Have an account, but it’s mostly for family communications. Anyway, here you go: https://m.facebook.com/benjamin.mayo.961
  • [Other]:
    I legitimately can’t make this photo thing work, I forgot how I did it last time.

Read full topic

sorry for being inactive on soundcloud, i was busy probably. if i made a instagram for wip music would anyone follow it at all i dont really want people in real life to know i make horrible sounds as a hobby so i dont have one but it could be fun maybe?
